homechoice mink blankets are more than just a blanket

They are a warm hug from a far-away favourite family member and a snuggly reason to sleep late every Saturday. But what makes them more than a blanket? Is it the supplier vetting to make sure the materials used are top-quality? Or is it thanks to the stringent standards of our quality assurance team that ensures you always receive blankets that stay as vibrant and super-soft as the day you bought them? Yes, it’s all this and more!

A blanket for everyone

Whether you’re a baby, a child, or an adult, we have a blanket to suit your needs - from creating light layers with our 1-ply 1kg blankets to creating cosy havens with our 3-ply 7kgs heavy hitters in trendy designs inspired by local and international styles, we’ve got you covered all year round.

A blanket for every budget

Everyone deserves a beautiful blanket, which is why we have options available to suit every budget. With blankets from under R500 to 3 for 2 combos – where you get a FREE blanket to keep the whole family extra warm, you will find beautiful blankets that help you create the home you love. What’s more, many of our blankets are reversible, giving you 2 different looks in 1 blanket. So, when you buy our 3-blanket combos, you get 6 different looks!

Have a look at our amazing blankets

Not all mink blankets are created equal

That’s why we always talk about the quality of the mink blankets at homechoice. Our product developers make sure that only premium-grade blankets are delivered to our customers. They maintain their softness, sheen and bright colours wash after wash unlike other mink blankets you might find. When you buy a homechoice blanket, you can rest assured it’s going to look and feel the same many years down the line.

Pro tip: Our mink blankets are made from high quality fabric, but that doesn’t mean you have to have them dry-cleaned. You can just as easily machine-wash or handwash them (some of the thick ones just might take a day or two to dry).

There are many types of mink blankets to choose from

You’ve probably heard of homechoice’s 3-ply 4kg mink blankets, but there are quite a number of variations in thickness, weight and style to choose from. Many of the blankets are reversible, giving you two unique designer prints on one blanket. Some are embossed, and some have faux sheep’s fleece (sherpa) on one side. You can even get one specifically designed to match your homechoice bedding set or a value set of three to share with the ones you love most.

The options are almost endless, but you can’t go wrong with our range of premium blankets. I’ve included a few of my favourites below, but my advice would be to explore the full range on our website and decide which ones YOU like best. Then you can spend every winter’s night feeling like royalty – perfectly relaxed in a nice, warm hug.

It makes a really thoughtful gift

When you wrap yourself in a mink blanket, its warm comfortable weight feels a lot like a great big hug. This makes it a really thoughtful gift for anyone who’s going through the death of a loved one or for a good friend who’s getting married.

It’s perfect to give to a family member who’s moving far away or to congratulate someone who’s done something great. A mink blanket is more than just a blanket. It’s a reminder of how much you care about the person you give it to, a hug that gives comfort for years.
